github.copilot.chat.reviewSelection.inst.text: Don't open the firewall, machines are on tailnet
Run `nixos-rebuild test` and verify whatever you were tasked to fix, before you run `nixos-rebuild switch`.

Start a session by understanding which machine you are working on. If you are on `tin`, you are connected via ssh and need to use `sudo` for elevating privileges. If you are on `iron` or `mercury` or other machine with GUI, use `pkexec` instead.
When executing systemctl commands use --no-pager where necessary
